org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.slice

Class AbstractSliceComplement<S extends SliceVW>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractAlgorithm
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractControllableAlgorithm
        • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditableAlgorithm
          • org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.AbstractComplementConstruction<FSA,FSA>
            • org.svvrl.goal.core.comp.slice.AbstractSliceComplement<S>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - the type of slices
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, Algorithm, AlgorithmListener, ComplementConstruction<FSA,FSA>, ControllableAlgorithm, EditableAlgorithm
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SliceKWConstruction, SliceVWConstruction

    public abstract class AbstractSliceComplement<S extends SliceVW>
extends AbstractComplementConstruction<FSA,FSA>
    This class provides a skeleton for the slice-based constructions.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      AbstractSliceComplement(FSA aut)
      Constructor with a source NBW to be complemented.
      AbstractSliceComplement(FSA aut, SliceKWOptions options)
      Constructor with a source NBW to be complemented and custom options for this slice-based construction.

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aut is not an NBW

      • AbstractSliceComplement

                               SliceKWOptions options)
        Constructor with a source NBW to be complemented and custom options for this slice-based construction.
        Parameters:
        aut - the source NBW to be complemented
        options - the options for this slice-based complementation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aut is not an NBW

      • complement

        public FSA complement()
        Description copied from interface: ComplementConstruction
        Performs the complementation and returns the complement.
        Returns:

      • prepareSourceAutomaton

        protected void prepareSourceAutomaton()
        Prepares the source NBW by (1) inserting an auxiliary proposition if its alphabet is empty, and (2) constructing the source successor map.

      • getStateFromSlice

        protected State getStateFromSlice(S slice)
        Returns the corresponding state in the slice automaton of a slice. If there is not such corresponding state, a new state will be created.
        Parameters:
        slice - a slice
        Returns:
        a state corresponding to slice

      • containsSlice

        protected boolean containsSlice(S slice)
        Returns true if there is an existing slice same as the specified slice.
        Parameters:
        slice - a slice to be checked
        Returns:
        true if there is an existing slice same as slice
